extension_name.description: Extension name displayed in browser UIs.

extension_short_name.description: Short name for extension surfaces with limited space.

extension_description.message: TTagger lets you organize your followed Twitch streamers with personal tags and quick filtering.
extension_description.description: Extension description shown in the web store and extension manager.

app_title.description: Dashboard page title and header text.

app_icon_alt.description: Alt text for the extension icon displayed in the dashboard and popup headers.

app_theme_label.description: Label for the theme preference controls.

app_theme_group_label.description: Aria-label for the theme toggle button group.

app_theme_tooltip_system.description: Tooltip for the system theme button.

app_theme_tooltip_dark.description: Tooltip for the dark theme button.

app_theme_tooltip_light.description: Tooltip for the light theme button.

app_theme_option_system.description: Accessible label for the system theme option.

app_theme_option_dark.description: Accessible label for the dark theme option.

app_theme_option_light.description: Accessible label for the light theme option.

common_settings.description: Label for buttons or links that open settings.

common_close.description: Generic close label used for modal dismiss buttons.

app_connect_button.description: Primary button text prompting the user to connect their Twitch account.

app_filter_streamer_label.description: Label for the streamer name filter input.

app_filter_streamer_placeholder.description: Placeholder text inside the streamer name filter input.

app_filter_streamer_clear.description: Aria label for clearing the streamer name filter.

app_filter_content_label.description: Label for the content filter input.

app_filter_content_placeholder.description: Placeholder text inside the content filter input.

app_filter_content_clear.description: Aria label for clearing the content filter.

app_sort_label.description: Accessible label for the sort select control.

app_sort_option_newest.description: Option text for sorting by newest follows.

app_sort_option_oldest.description: Option text for sorting by oldest follows.

app_sort_option_name_ascending.description: Option text for sorting by streamer name ascending.

app_sort_option_name_descending.description: Option text for sorting by streamer name descending.

app_live_toggle.description: Label for the toggle that prioritizes live streamers.

app_starred_toggle.description: Label for the toggle that prioritizes starred streamers.

app_tag_toggle.description: Label for the button that toggles the tag panel on mobile.

app_tag_section_heading.description: Heading label for the tag sidebar.

app_reorder_tags_button.description: Button text used to enable tag reorder mode.

app_reorder_tags_aria.description: Accessible label for the tag reorder mode toggle.

app_reorder_tags_finish.description: Accessible label when tag sort mode is active.

app_add_tag_button.description: Button text used to add a new tag.

app_hide_tags.description: Aria label for the button that closes the tag sidebar.

app_tag_list_label.description: Accessible label for the tag sidebar list element.

app_modal_new_tag_title.description: Title for the create tag modal dialog.

app_modal_rename_tag_title.description: Title for the rename tag modal dialog.

app_modal_tag_name_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for tag name inputs.

app_modal_color_picker_title_named.description: Title for the color picker modal with a specific tag name.

app_modal_color_picker_title_generic.description: Title for the color picker modal without a specific tag name.

app_modal_color_custom_label.description: Label for the custom color input in the color picker modal.

app_modal_color_custom_hint.message: Use the color input or pick one of the defaults.
app_modal_color_custom_hint.description: Helper text explaining how to pick colors in the modal.

app_modal_color_default_label.description: Label for the default color swatches section.

app_modal_color_default_aria.description: Accessible label for the default color swatch grid.

app_modal_color_swatch_label.description: Accessible label for an individual color swatch option.

app_modal_delete_tag_title.description: Title for the delete tag confirmation modal.

app_modal_delete_tag_message.message: Are you sure you want to delete "$TAG$"? This action cannot be undone.
app_modal_delete_tag_message.description: Confirmation message when deleting a tag.

app_modal_delete_tag_confirm.description: Confirmation button label for deleting a tag.

app_error_rename_tag.description: Error shown when a tag rename fails.

app_error_update_tag_color.description: Error shown when updating a tag color fails.

app_error_delete_tag.description: Error shown when deleting a tag fails.

app_error_update_favorite.description: Error shown when the starred state update fails.

app_error_update_tag_assignment.description: Error shown when a tag assignment toggle fails.

app_error_reorder_tags.description: Error shown when tag reordering fails.

app_error_login.description: Error message when Twitch login fails.

app_error_open_settings.description: Error shown when the settings page cannot be opened.

app_error_refresh_data.description: Error shown when refreshing follows fails.

app_error_create_tag.description: Error shown when creating a tag fails.

app_streamer_count_initial.description: Initial text shown before follows are loaded.

app_streamer_count_single.description: Streamer count label shown when exactly one streamer is listed.

app_streamer_count_multiple.description: Streamer count label shown when multiple streamers are listed.

app_refresh_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the dashboard refresh button.

app_signed_out_message.message: Sign in to load your followed streamers.
app_signed_out_message.description: Message shown in the dashboard when the user is signed out.

popup_open_settings.description: Aria label for the popup button that opens settings.

popup_default_tag_name.description: Fallback tag name used in popup messages when no tag is selected.

popup_toggle_notifications.description: Aria label for the popup notifications toggle.

popup_notifications_label.description: Visually hidden label for the notifications toggle in the popup.

popup_reset_to_starred.description: Tooltip and aria label for the popup reset button.

popup_loading_indicator.description: Loading text displayed next to the popup spinner.

popup_open_app.description: Button text used to open the full dashboard from the popup.

popup_no_live_streamers.message: No $TAG$ streamers are live right now.
popup_no_live_streamers.description: Message shown when no streamers are live for the selected tag.

popup_signin_message.message: Sign in to Twitch to manage your starred streamers and get live notifications.
popup_signin_message.description: Instructional text shown when the user needs to sign in from the popup.

popup_signin_button.description: Popup button text used to initiate Twitch sign-in.

common_signin_loading.description: Accessible loading text displayed in various contexts.

popup_no_title.description: Fallback stream title shown when none is provided.

popup_error_unable_dashboard.message: Unable to load streamers. Open the dashboard for full controls.
popup_error_unable_dashboard.description: Error shown when popup data cannot be loaded.

popup_error_open_dashboard.message: Unable to open the dashboard automatically. Please open it from chrome://extensions.
popup_error_open_dashboard.description: Message shown when the dashboard cannot be opened automatically.

popup_error_open_settings.message: Unable to open settings automatically. Use the extensions page instead.
popup_error_open_settings.description: Message shown when the settings page cannot be opened automatically.

popup_error_refresh.description: Error shown when refreshing popup data fails.

popup_error_toggle_notifications.description: Error shown when toggling notifications fails.

popup_error_signin_short.description: Short error used in thrown errors when sign-in fails.

popup_error_load_data.description: Generic error used when popup data cannot be loaded.

options_title.description: Document title for the options page.

options_heading.description: Main heading text on the options page.

options_section_data_portability.description: Heading for the data portability section.

options_section_language.description: Heading for the language override section.

options_section_stream_opening.description: Heading for the stream opening preferences section.

options_section_twitch_integration.description: Heading for the Twitch integration section.

options_section_update_log.description: Heading for the update log section.

options_data_portability_help.message: Exported files let you migrate tags and cached data between browsers.
options_data_portability_help.description: Helper text explaining the data portability actions.

options_export_button.description: Button text for exporting user data.

options_import_button.description: Button text for importing user data.

options_reset_button.description: Button text for resetting tags and favorites.

options_notifications_help.message: Get notified when starred streamers go live. Requires authentication.

options_notifications_toggle.description: Label for the live notifications toggle.

options_notifications_cutoff_label.message: Only notify for streams started within
options_notifications_cutoff_label.description: Label for the notification cutoff input.

options_notifications_cutoff_suffix.description: Suffix shown next to the notification cutoff input.

options_notifications_cutoff_help.message: Streams older than this window will not trigger alerts when checks resume.
options_notifications_cutoff_help.description: Helper text explaining the notification cutoff setting.

options_notifications_cutoff_success.description: Success message shown when the notification cutoff value is updated.

options_notifications_cutoff_error.message: Failed to update the notification window.
options_notifications_cutoff_error.description: Error message shown when updating the notification cutoff fails.

options_language_help.message: Override the extension language. Defaults to your browser language.
options_language_help.description: Helper text explaining the language override setting.

options_language_select_label.description: Label for the language override select element.

options_language_option_system.description: Select option for following the browser language.

options_language_option_en.description: Select option for English language override.

options_language_option_de.description: Select option for German language override.

options_stream_opening_help.message: Control how streams open when clicking streamers in the popup. Hold Shift to toggle behavior.
options_stream_opening_help.description: Helper text explaining stream opening settings.

options_stream_opening_new_tab.description: Radio button label for opening streams in a new tab.

options_stream_opening_current_tab.description: Radio button label for opening streams in the current tab.

options_stream_opening_smart.message: Smart (only if blank or on Twitch)
options_stream_opening_smart.description: Radio button label for smart stream opening behavior.

options_twitch_integration_help.message: Highlight starred streamers on Twitch.tv with a customizable ring and compact tag badges.

options_twitch_integration_toggle.description: Label for the Twitch highlighting toggle.

options_twitch_sidebar_tags_toggle.message: Show tag badges next to streamers
options_twitch_sidebar_tags_toggle.description: Label for the Twitch sidebar tag badges toggle.

options_twitch_highlight_color_label.description: Label for the Twitch highlight color picker.

options_twitch_highlight_color_help.message: Pick the color used for the ring and glow around starred streamers.
options_twitch_highlight_color_help.description: Helper text for the Twitch highlight color picker.

options_twitch_highlight_color_reset.description: Button label to reset the Twitch highlight color to default.

options_highlight_color_success.description: Success message when the Twitch highlight color preference is saved.

options_highlight_color_error.message: Failed to update Twitch highlight color.
options_highlight_color_error.description: Error message when the Twitch highlight color preference fails to save.

options_highlight_color_invalid.message: Enter a valid hex color value, such as #ffd700.
options_highlight_color_invalid.description: Validation message when the Twitch highlight color input is invalid.

options_highlight_color_reset_success.message: Reset the Twitch highlight color to default gold.
options_highlight_color_reset_success.description: Success message when the Twitch highlight color is reset.

options_sidebar_tags_enabled.description: Success message for enabling Twitch sidebar tag badges.

options_sidebar_tags_disabled.description: Success message for disabling Twitch sidebar tag badges.

options_sidebar_tags_error.message: Failed to update sidebar tag badges preference.
options_sidebar_tags_error.description: Error message shown when the Twitch sidebar tag badge preference fails to save.

options_authentication_help.message: Disconnecting clears tokens and cached data.
options_authentication_help.description: Helper text explaining the disconnect action.

options_disconnect_button.description: Button text for disconnecting the Twitch account.

options_status_button.description: Button text for checking diagnostics status.

options_debug_logging_toggle.message: Enable debug logging in Twitch integrations
options_debug_logging_toggle.description: Label for the debug logging toggle in settings.

options_debug_logging_help.message: When enabled, content scripts log additional details to the browser console for troubleshooting.
options_debug_logging_help.description: Helper text explaining the debug logging toggle.

options_debug_logging_enabled.message: Debug logging enabled. Open the browser console to view messages.
options_debug_logging_enabled.description: Success message shown when debug logging is enabled.

options_debug_logging_disabled.description: Success message shown when debug logging is disabled.

options_debug_logging_error.message: Failed to update debug logging preference.
options_debug_logging_error.description: Error message shown when updating debug logging preference fails.

options_update_log_refresh.description: Button text for refreshing the update log.

options_update_log_clear.description: Button text for clearing the update log.

options_update_log_export.description: Button text for exporting the update log.

options_update_log_help.message: Shows when live streamer updates ran and what triggered them.
options_update_log_help.description: Helper text explaining the update log.

options_update_log_loading.description: Placeholder text in the update log table while entries load.

options_export_success.message: Export generated. Download should start automatically.
options_export_success.description: Success message shown after exporting data.

options_export_error.description: Error message shown when exporting data fails.

options_import_replace_prompt.message: Importing will replace your existing tags and assignments. Continue?
options_import_replace_prompt.description: Confirmation prompt shown before replacing data during import.

options_import_replace_success.description: Success message when imported data replaces existing data.

options_import_error.message: Failed to import data. Ensure the file is a valid export.
options_import_error.description: Error message shown when importing data fails.

options_signout_prompt.message: Disconnect Twitch and clear cached data?
options_signout_prompt.description: Confirmation prompt shown before signing out.

options_signout_success.description: Success message when Twitch is disconnected.

options_signout_error.description: Error message shown when sign-out fails.

options_status_signed_in.description: Status message when the user is signed in.

options_status_signed_out.description: Status message when the user is not signed in.

options_status_error.description: Error message shown when checking status fails.

options_notifications_require_auth.description: Tooltip shown when notifications cannot be toggled without signing in.

options_reset_require_auth.description: Tooltip shown when reset is disabled because the user is signed out.

options_notifications_enabled.description: Success message when notifications are turned on.

options_notifications_disabled.description: Success message when notifications are turned off.

options_notifications_update_error.description: Error message when notification settings cannot be updated.

options_language_update_success.message: Language updated. Reload other extension pages to apply.
options_language_update_success.description: Success message shown after changing the language override.

options_language_update_error.description: Error message shown when updating the language override fails.

options_open_never.message: Streams will open in new tabs.
options_open_never.description: Status message when open-in-current-tab preference is set to never.

options_open_always.message: Streams will open in current tab.
options_open_always.description: Status message when open-in-current-tab preference is set to always.

options_open_smart.message: Streams will open smartly (current tab only if blank or on Twitch).
options_open_smart.description: Status message when smart open-in-current-tab preference is selected.

options_open_toggle_hint.description: Additional hint appended to stream opening status messages.

options_open_error.message: Failed to update stream opening preference.
options_open_error.description: Error message when updating stream opening preferences fails.

options_highlighting_enabled.message: Twitch highlighting enabled. Reload Twitch.tv to see changes.

options_highlighting_disabled.message: Twitch highlighting disabled. Reload Twitch.tv to see changes.

options_highlighting_error.message: Failed to update Twitch highlighting preference.
options_highlighting_error.description: Error message when updating highlighting preference fails.

options_reset_confirm_primary.description: First confirmation prompt shown before resetting data.

options_reset_confirm_secondary.message: Are you really sure? This action cannot be undone.
options_reset_confirm_secondary.description: Second confirmation prompt shown before resetting data.

options_resetting_label.description: Temporary button label shown while data reset is in progress.

options_reset_success.message: Tags and favorites reset. Reload the dashboard to see the changes.
options_reset_success.description: Success message shown after data reset.

options_reset_error.description: Error message shown when resetting data fails.

options_log_status_skipped.description: Badge label for skipped log entries.

options_log_status_success.description: Badge label for successful log entries.

options_log_status_failed.description: Badge label for failed log entries.

options_log_unknown_error.description: Fallback error text when a log entry has no error message.

options_log_skip_no_cache.description: Skip reason indicating missing cache data.

options_log_skipped_title.description: Tooltip text for skipped log entries.

options_log_failed_title.description: Tooltip text for failed log entries displaying the error message.

options_log_load_error.description: Message shown when the update log cannot be loaded.

options_log_trigger_alarm.description: Badge label for log entries triggered by alarms.

options_log_trigger_manual.description: Badge label for manually triggered log entries.

options_log_trigger_fallback.description: Badge label for fallback-triggered log entries.

options_log_trigger_initialization.description: Badge label for initialization-triggered log entries.

options_log_trigger_unknown.description: Badge label for log entries with an unknown trigger.

options_log_clear_success.description: Success message shown after clearing the update log.

options_log_clear_error.description: Error message shown when clearing the update log fails.

options_log_export_success.message: Update log exported. Download should start automatically.
options_log_export_success.description: Success message shown after exporting the update log.

options_log_export_error.description: Error message shown when exporting the update log fails.

app_working_status.description: Button text shown while a tag operation is in progress.

popup_notifications_title.description: Tooltip text for the notifications toggle button.

popup_refresh_title.description: Tooltip text for the refresh button in the popup.

app_meta_viewers.description: Label shown next to the viewer count in the dashboard.

app_meta_viewer_single.description: Label shown when exactly one viewer is watching.

app_meta_live_prefix.description: Prefix shown before the uptime in the dashboard.

app_badge_live.description: Badge text shown for live streamers.

app_meta_status_offline.description: Label shown when a streamer is offline.

app_meta_last_seen.description: Label describing when a streamer was last seen live.

app_meta_followed_date.description: Label showing when the user followed a streamer.

app_meta_followed_unknown.description: Label shown when the follow date cannot be determined.

app_stream_preview_alt.description: Alt text for the streamer preview image in the dashboard.

app_reorder_drag_handle_title.description: Tooltip for the tag list drag handle.

app_loading_label.description: Short label shown while data is loading.

app_loading_streamers.description: Message shown while the streamer grid is loading.

app_loading_tags.description: Message shown while the tag list is loading.

app_no_matching_streamers.description: Empty state message when no streamers satisfy the current filters.

app_last_seen_just_now.description: Relative time label for events that just happened.

app_last_seen_minutes.description: Relative time label for minutes ago.

app_last_seen_hours.description: Relative time label for hours ago.

app_last_seen_days.description: Relative time label for days ago.

app_meta_updated_just_now.description: Status text when the follow list was refreshed moments ago.

content_no_tags_assigned.description: Message shown when a streamer has no tags assigned.

content_no_tags_label.description: Label preceding the tag badges on twitch.tv pages.

content_no_tags_available.description: Message shown when no tags are available on twitch.tv pages.

content_no_custom_tags.message: No custom tags yet. Create tags in the extension popup.
content_no_custom_tags.description: Message prompting users to create tags in the extension.

content_manage_tags.description: Tooltip and aria label for the manage tags button.

content_create_new_tag.description: Label for the create new tag button on twitch.tv pages.

content_create_tag_placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown when creating a new tag on twitch.tv pages.

content_create_tag_save.description: Tooltip text for the save button when creating a new tag on twitch.tv pages.

content_error_toggle_star.message: Failed to update star status. Please try again.
content_error_toggle_star.description: Alert shown when the star toggle fails on twitch.tv pages.

content_error_toggle_tag.message: Failed to update tag assignment. Please try again.
content_error_toggle_tag.description: Alert shown when assigning or unassigning a tag fails on twitch.tv pages.

content_error_create_tag.message: Failed to create tag. Please try again.
content_error_create_tag.description: Alert shown when creating a tag from twitch.tv pages fails.

content_add_to_starred.description: Label for adding a streamer to starred list.

content_remove_from_starred.description: Label for removing a streamer from starred list.

app_tag_menu_label.description: Aria label for the dashboard tag assignment menu.

app_tag_menu_empty.message: Create a tag to get started.
app_tag_menu_empty.description: Message shown when no tags are available in the dashboard menu.

app_meta_updated_minute.description: Status text when the cache was refreshed one minute ago.

app_meta_updated_minutes.description: Status text when the cache was refreshed multiple minutes ago.
